body_html: @achowdhery I was looking for object detection using front camera. I switched to front camera but the detected bounding boxes are incorrect? I think they are inverted with respect to the camera orientation. Could you suggest me where to edit the code to correct this problem? Thanks! The stack overflow question is here https://stackoverflow.com/q/51268196/9394171
